page.title: 15Christian Care,Marnhull.
page.content: MARNHULL CHRISTIAN CARE is a community effort to offer help and assistance to anyone in need in the parish.A committee comprises members of the 3 village churches.In each road a contact person acts as a link, visiting newcomers and being available either to help in person in case of emergency,or by relaying news to others who can help. A comprehensive list of essential services is given to all residents and help is available in many practical ways,particularly for elderly and disabled people. The MARNHULL MESSENGER comes out six times a year and is disributed free to 880 homes.The churches,clubs and societies send contributions to the editor who designed the cover and does any drawings inside.It costs Â£490 to print,covered mainly by advertising.
